address: Lot 132 Annie Ave Lang Lang VIC 3984

Prime rural land holding in the Hub of Grantville and tourist hotspot to all of the Bass Coast is the ultimate private estate or exceptional lifestyle, or development opportunity.
Easy access to the city of Melbourne is only an hour and 20 minutes’ drive away, while the area’s in – demand tourist attractions such as local vine yards, Penguin Parade, and much more and is only 40 minutes to the world – famous GP track.
Immaculately presented throughout this expansive design offering 4-5 bedroom with new carpet and flooring through the home. The home offers two bathroom’s, renovated kitchen and modern design and offers natural light throughout. The open plan design amplifies your indoor/ outdoor lifestyle to enjoy the most magnificent outlook, framed by beautiful garden and picturesque acreage, including horse paddock and stables.
This magical home presents many options for the astute buyer, suitable for families, investors or developers, (as there is potential for subdivide on this stunning 3 acres approx subject to council approval ( STCA )
The property is tucked away from it all but conveniently surrounded by all amenities including beach trails, public transport, cafes, shops, Medical services & much more.
This truly is an opportunity not to be missed
Daniel & Tamara from @realty Bass Coast have the pleasure of presenting this magnificent property in Grantville – Call today to arrange your inspection.

address: 260 Gurdies St Hellier Road The Gurdies VIC 3984
description:
High and mighty with 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms on 5 acres!
This delightful light and spacious home has wonderful 180 degree views including those of Western Port Bay, Phillip and French Islands with farm and native bush in the foreground.
Open plan as new kitchen/dining/living room/meals room with the relaxing atmosphere created by large wrap around verandas. Kitchen has dishwasher, extensive bench space, living room with "Lopi" wood heater and split system. The library is a fantastic room with ambiance and further enhanced by an OFP. 4 bedrooms include main with as new ensuite and window day bed, guest bedroom with shared access to family bathroom, large guest bedroom with water views and 4th kids single bed room. 3rd toilet in powder room, Sun room, laundry with second cooking area plus office makes it all very comfortable! 3 timber decks offer all year round enjoyment. Double carport and several farm buildings. 3 paddocks and a dam.
Fronts onto sealed road with Pakenham less than an hours drive away.

RESORT STYLE LIVING - FAMILY HOME WITH EVERY POSSIBLE LUXURY!
This magnificent, custom-built residence offers the ultimate in luxury living across 72 squares, set on a private one acre of land.
The home is designed to ensure privacy and plenty of space for the whole family. An expansive parents retreat upstairs is comprised of master bedroom with full ensuite and walk in robe, Juliet balcony, study nook and separate living room.
Four further bedrooms have their own wing, ideal for kids or guests, with another living room and central bathroom.
At the heart of the home is the enormous kitchen/dining/living space with premium appliances including Smeg Induction 900mm oven, inbuilt coffee machine & microwave and island bench. Further entertainment space is provided in the theatre room with leather lounge suites and cinema screen. Inside leisure is completed by a gymnasium and 6-person Swedish style sauna.
In the third wing of the house a fitted home office with separate entrance and powder room adjoins the double garage.
Further features include refrigerated cooling, ducted heating, ducted vaccum, security system with alarm and CCTV, NBN internet, 15kw solar system and natural gas.
Outdoor living centres around the 12 x 4m solar heated inground pool with gas heated spa. Undercover outdoor living room features built in BBQ and pizza oven overlooking the kids play area. There is also a self contained cabana with tv, lounge, bar and outdoor shower and toilet.
Electronic gates open to a sealed driveway, leading to extensive shedding, workshop and parking areas for all size vehicles.
Your ideal lifestyle property in fast growing Lang Lang is just 87kms from Melbourne CBD with the beautiful beaches and attractions of Phillip Island a short drive further down the Bass Highway.
Internal area
668.88m²

YOUR NEXT VENTURE AWAITS!!
A fantastic opportunity exists with this unique freehold of approx 1349 sqms with a large 15m x 15.5m workshop / storage facility.
The property is zoned township and has power, water and phone connected and comes with vacant possession.
There is ample room at the rear of the block for a dwelling / development (S.T.C.A.).
An extensive list of plant and equipment is included in the price.
The property has great street frontage and could be used for a variety of uses only limited by your imagination.
Explore today....

Private Resort Style Living on 1/4 acre
On the edge of Lang lang township, this exquisite single-level residence is defined by a style that is beautiful, calm and easy to live in.

Quiet Court Location
This light filled 4 bedroom 2 bathroom brick veneer home is positioned on a large 702m2 block. The master bedroom with ceiling fan, has a WIR and ensuite. The other 3 bedrooms all have built in robes and bedroom 2 also with ceiling fan. There is a main lounge room at the front of the home and a family room, which leads out to the covered entertainment area complete with cafe' blinds and an allocation to connect up a television.
The kitchen has a 4 burner gas cook top, dishwasher, overhead cupboard, corner pantry and plenty of bench space. There is gas ducted heating throughout and a large split system air conditioner in the family room.
This home has 8 solar panels on the roof, there are 2 water tanks, which service the toilets and can be switched back to mains if needed. Outside there is a two car garage URL, fruit trees, vegetable planting boxes and 3 x 3 garden shed.

Move in Ready Living
Set in one of the most popular locations Lang Lang has to offer, walking distance to shops, medical centre, school, daycare/kinder and public transport is this surprisingly spacious, 3 year old family home. With 4 bedrooms, 2 living areas, 2 bathrooms and a decked outdoor living area this one will tick all the boxes for many. The kitchen presents with stainless appliances, dishwasher and plentiful cabinetry, with large preparation bench overlooking the dining/living making social gatherings a breeze. Additional living needs are met with a sizable formal lounge/family room at the front of the home.
Accommodation needs are met with a master suite with walk-in robe and ensuite, additional 3 bedrooms have built-in robes and are serviced by a bright and spacious family bathroom.
A sense of modern style is increased with stylish floating timber floors throughout, upgraded light fittings and fans to all bedrooms - as well as ducted heating and split system cooling.
Outside is an oversized double garage with heaps of space for storage as well as parking. A rare treat of side access for parking of a trailer and a great rear deck with retractable awning perfect for entertaining all year round. All set on a 657sqm block leaving enough space for the kids to play or the dog to run, or the gardener to garden.
This one really is a move-in ready home, and presents with nothing to do. Move in, relax and enjoy in a home that will be sure to please
